title: Here's Everything You Need To Know About The "Quiet Quitting" Trend
description:
There's a new trend that is starting to become more common in the workplace. It's called "quiet quitting." Basically, people in the workplace prioritize their at-home life over giving their all to their job without the proper recognition.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
